English.Text: A nearby castle or country residence, of course! "Eliminate all other factors, and what remains is the truth," as the sleuths say, and the Queen would never be content to stay in town. Calculating you are no more than two days behind the Queen's retinue, you are able to draw a circle on a map around suitably regal stopovers. It is now but a question of exactly which of her landed relatives she came here to visit...
